resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99916</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99916</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat conduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction de la chaleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução do calor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione di calore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή θερμότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción del calor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the conduction of heat through a spoon handle by the spreading of vibrations of particles from the hot end to the cold end of the spoon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold end</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot end</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particle vibration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spoon handle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Übertragung der Hitze 
durch einen Löffelhandgriff durch das Verbreiten von Erschütterungen
der Partikel vom heißen Ende zum kalten Ende des Löffels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la conduction de la 
chaleur par un traitement de cuillère par la propagation des 
vibrations des particules de l'extrémité chaude à l'extrémité 
froide de la cuillère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a condução do calor 
através de um punho da colher espalhar das vibrações das 
partículas da extremidade quente à extremidade fria da colher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la conduzione di 
calore tramite una maniglia del cucchiaio dalla diffusione delle 
vibrazioni delle particelle dall'estremità calda all'estremità 
fredda del cucchiaio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διεξαγωγή της 
θερμότητας μέσω μιας λαβής κουταλιών με τη διάδοση των δονήσεων 
των μορίων από το καυτό τέλος στο κρύο τέλος του κουταλιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la conducción del 
calor a través de una manija de la cuchara por separarse de 
vibraciones de partículas del extremo caliente al extremo frío de la
cuchara.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kaltes Ende</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heißes Ende</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikelerschütterung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Löffelhandgriff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">extrémité froide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conduction de la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">extrémité chaude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vibration de particules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traitement de cuillère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">extremidade fria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">condução do calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">extremidade quente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vibração da partícula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">punho da colher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">estremità fredda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conduzione di calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">estremità calda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vibrazione della particella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">maniglia del cucchiaio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λαβή κουταλιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conducción del calor</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">extremo caliente</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
